overview: Brazilian stud Gabriel Alonzo loves to seduce straight boys while his boyfriend JD Phoenix secretly watches the action go down - especially when the prey is hot, hung college boy Michael Delray! Meanwhile east coast bad boy Roman Todd is feeling bi-curious, and sets his sights on sensitive twink JD to explore his homoerotic desires in a scorching hot scene. Then childhood best friends Tobias and Michael Delray try to fight the sexual tension building between them - but ultimately fail and give in to their uncontrollable lust for each other's tight, muscular bodies.
tagline: Straight boys are sexy... once they stop being straight.
title: Straight Boy Seductions 5
